headline: Invest in SoFi or Fiserv? The fintech stock this expert is betting on
summary: In the latest Good Buy or Goodbye, Infinity Ventures partner Kamran Ansari explains why investors should buy SoFi Technologies (SOFI) but skip Fiserv (FISV). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: 2 Reasons to Avoid FI and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Fiserv has gotten torched over the last six months - since May 2025, its stock price has dropped 62.3% to $63.69 per share. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
